protein.general_function: Involved in sequence-specific DNA binding transcription factor activity
protein.specific_function: Binds and transactivates the retinoic acid response elements that control expression of the retinoic acid receptor beta 2 and alcohol dehydrogenase 3 genes. Transactivates both the phenobarbital responsive element module of the human CYP2B6 gene and the CYP3A4 xenobiotic response element

go_class.description: sequence-specific dna binding transcription factor activity

reference.reference_text: Baes M, Gulick T, Choi HS, Martinoli MG, Simha D, Moore DD: A new orphan member of the nuclear hormone receptor superfamily that interacts with a subset of retinoic acid response elements. Mol Cell Biol. 1994 Mar;14(3):1544-52.
